description:
"SALES HUNTERS ONLY " (This role is NOT for FARMERS)

Senior Sales Director – Digital Distribution

Location:

Remote – United States (working eastern standard time zone)

Qualifications:
• A self-starter with a stellar sales track record, a strategic approach to sales, and an ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
• An undergraduate degree with at least ten years of client-facing experience within Financial Media sales.
• A team-oriented sales professional with extensive knowledge of the digital media, the financial services industry, as well as of key industry trends across the asset management and financial advisor market.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills, as well as an aptitude for negotiation and persuasion.
• Fluent use of Salesforce.
• MBA, CFA, or CFP designation is highly desirable.

Your Day to Day:

The Digital Distribution team is a platform of capabilities that intelligently connects investment issuers with advisors. Firms augment or fully outsource their sales & marketing efforts to VettaFi to amplify the investment messaging with the focus on growing their business through the Advisor community. It’s an elegant combination of digital media and financial services. In this position, you will be an integral part of growing one of the fastest-growing segments of financial services. You will be the responsible for building awareness and selling VettaFi’s digital distribution capabilities to mostly new logos across ETF & MF issuers, FinTech, Insurance, and other financial services firms who want to amplify their message through VettaFi. Responsibilities included in this role:
• Meet and exceed annual revenue targets by maintaining a clean, full sales pipeline of opportunities with both new prospects and existing clients.
• Manage and own sales process, including sourcing new opportunities, conceiving, and presenting unique solutions to meet client needs.
• Coordinate all prospect meetings, client presentations, and support RFP activities and any other sales activities related to growing the business.
• Act as a conduit between the clients and Digital Distribution Product Management team.
• Work closely with peers to share insights and assist in cross-sell opportunities.
• Need to learn the full capabilities across VettaFi.

Start with WHY:

Why you should join the VettaFi Team…
• Join a fast-paced agile team that innovates weekly and collaborates cross-functionality with openness and transparency.
• Our momentum is based on great attitudes and focused drive.
• We don't always have the answers, but look forward to pushing ourselves, growing, and improving together as a team.
• Competitive salaries, upward mobility and an opportunity to grow professionally with our company.
• Solid health, dental and vision benefits.
• Exposure to a huge, growing market -- U.S. listed ETFs sport over $4 trillion in assets under management and have grown at a 26% compounded annual growth rate for 20+ years.
• Opportunity to interact with our team members across North America including New York, Southern California, Chicago, and New Jersey.
• Your work will have a large, immediate impact on the business.
• We are a focused, hungry team of professionals who share the same vision and desire for success.
• Collaborative work environment built on respect, openness and intellectual honesty.

Who are WE:

VettaFi is a high-growth and profitable technology company that sits at the nexus of three exciting mega trends:
• Business intelligence (including the application of machine learning).
• The evolution of financial services, both through innovations in product and product delivery.
• The internet as a medium.

Through its wholly owned and operated brands, collectively the most influential digital voice in the world of exchange traded funds (ETFs) -- ETF Database and ETF Trends -- VettaFi interacts with tens of thousands of US financial advisors at an unparalleled level of depth every week.

With an educational mission, VettaFi produces and disseminates numerous types of multimedia content to fuel the research process of financial advisors, including webcasts, video, native content channels, interactive data-driven tools, and editorial content.

In compliance with local law, we are disclosing the compensation, or a range thereof, for roles that will be performed in New York City. Actual salaries will vary and may be above or below the range based on various factors including but not limited to location, experience, and performance. The range listed is just one component of VettaFi’s total compensation package for employees.

Pay Range: $150,000 - $170,000 salary per year.

Other rewards may include annual discretionary bonuses, short- and long-term incentives, and program-specific awards. In addition, VettaFi provides a variety of benefits to employees, including health insurance coverage, an employee wellness program, life and disability insurance, a retirement savings plan, paid holidays and paid time off (PTO).

VettaFi is an equal opportunity employer. VettaFi is committed to being an employer of choice, not just a good place to work, but a great and inclusive place to work. To that end, we strive to recruit and maintain a workforce that meaningfully represents the diverse and culturally rich communities that we serve. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status or disabled status or, genetic information.
